messages: I need to develop Zephyr code on an ESP32, which  sends a CoAP request to an COAP server. The program is configured to send CoAP POST requests "Hello, COAP Cloud" to the COAP server at IP address "47.102.103.1" and port 5683, with the URI path "/coap/test".

Now, try again. Check the error information: ["E:/local_code/IoT/zephyrproject/zephyr/my/LLM_Gen/src/main.c:71:20: error: 'NET_REQUEST_WIFI_CONNECT' undeclared (first use in this function)"] and Invoke the code tool to solve the error and structure the output with a prefix and code block.

Your answer cannot contain the provided headers and apis from blacklist!): ['zephyr/kernel.h', 'zephyr/net/socket.h', 'zephyr/net/coap.h', 'zephyr/net/net_ip.h', 'zephyr/net/net_context.h', 'zephyr/net/wifi.h', 'zephyr/sys/printk.h', 'coap_packet_append_option', 'coap_packet_append_payload_marker', 'coap_packet_append_payload']

Your answer must contain all the ['zephyr/net/mqtt.h', 'zephyr/storage/flash_map.h', 'zephyr/net/wifi_mgmt.h', 'zephyr/sys/printk.h', 'zephyr/kernel.h', 'zephyr/net/net_mgmt.h', 'zephyr/net/coap.h', '#include zephyr/net/net_mgmt.h', 'zephyr/net/socket.h', 'zephyr/fs/nvs.h', 'zephyr/net/mqtt_sn.h', 'zephyr/drivers/flash.h']!
